fields.name: How Computers Really Work
fields.description:
An approachable, hands-on guide to understanding how computers work, from low-level circuits to high-level code.

How Computers Really Work is a hands-on guide to the computing ecosystem: everything from circuits to memory and clock signals, machine code, programming languages, operating systems, and the internet.

fields.name: Grokking Algorithms
fields.description:
English edition  by Aditya Bhargava (auteur)
See all formats and editions
A friendly, fully-illustrated introduction to the most important computer programming algorithms.
Master the most widely used algorithms and be fully prepared when you're asked about them at your next job interview. With beautifully simple explanations, over 400 fun illustrations, and dozens of relevant examples, you'll actually enjoy learning about algorithms with this fun and friendly guide!

fields.name: Software Architecture
fields.description: There are no easy decisions in software architecture. Instead, there are many hard parts--difficult problems or issues with no best practices--that force you to choose among various compromises. With this book, you'll learn how to think critically about the trade-offs involved with distributed architectures.

fields.name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
fields.description:
FORGED FROM TITANIUM – iPhone 15 Pro Max features a strong and lightweight design made of high-quality titanium with a textured frosted glass back. The front features Ceramic Shield, which is stronger than any smartphone glass. And it is splash, water and dust resistant.
DISCLAIMERS – This is an overview of the most important product features. Check below for more information.

fields.name: Dell SE2422HX 24"
fields.description:
More screen space (24" Monitor): The slim bezels do not distract from what you see on the screen, thanks to a higher screen-to-monitor ratio.
Robust and compact: Enjoy more workspace and a larger desktop with this small footprint monitor, including a 23% smaller stand
Customizable to your needs: Tilt the monitor quickly and easily for just the right viewing angle, or attach the monitor to the compatible VESA system
More viewing comfort: Minimize the radiation of harmful blue light

Intel Celeron N4020 (2C / 2T, 1.1 / 2.8GHz, 4MB)
4GB RAM, 128GB SSD

fields.name: ACEMAGIC Laptop
fields.description: Perfect portability: The ACEMAGIC AX16 laptop is a true Road Warrior, which has a slim and lightweight design with dimensions of only 350 x 220 x 16 mm and a weight of only 1.5 kg. This laptop's smart flat hinge allows you to share content or collaborate with friends. The metal housing ensures durability while adding an elegant touch. MSDUQTIZXRUITAIDJEDJEO

fields.name: Logitech K120
fields.description:
Virtually quiet, low-profile keys
Industrial standard layout with full-size F-keys and numeric keypad
Slim, thin profile keyboard with spill-resistant design
Plug-and-play USB connection
Bold, bright white letters

fields.name: Razer Ornata V3
fields.description:
Low Keys: Thinner keycaps and shorter switches put your hand in a natural position, so you can play for hours without much stress.
Razer silent membrane switches: The Razer Ornata V3 X is ideal for those who want to be able to play or type quieter and with more comfort.

fields.name: MAGIC-REFINER RK68 Wireless Keyboard
fields.description: Dual-mode 2.4Ghz & Bluetooth 5.0】This wireless keyboard is equipped with an improved wireless Bluetooth chip, the stable and low latency connection offers you a truly wireless experience. Unlike wired mechanical keyboards, you can connect up to three wireless devices simultaneously, Fn+Q switches to wireless 2.4G mode, Fn+W/E switches to Bluetooth mode, and can store up to two Bluetooth devices.
